forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
The early hours in Downtown San Francisco paint a picture of tranquility under the muted comfort of a mostly cloudy sky, with the temperature resting around a gentle 50 degrees. As dawn approaches and the city awakens, the remnants of the night linger softly in the air, while a light west wind whispers through the streets. Expect a transition as the day unfolds, leading to mostly sunny conditions that coax the mercury up to a pleasant 62 degrees, though a subtle drop to approximately 58 is anticipated in the early afternoon. 

Today’s weather invites a layered approach to your attire. Perhaps a light sweater or jacket will suffice for the morning chill, while as the sun emerges, a simple shirt underneath may allow for comfort as warmth wraps around the city. If you're pondering how to spend this day, consider a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the marine layer may retreat, giving way to clearer views of the Golden Gate. Alternatively, find a cozy café in one of the vibrant neighborhoods, savoring a warm beverage while soaking in the local ambiance—each quaint street corner offering its own story.
